backend/main.mo: Minimal canister actor with no logic, serving as a placeholder for the deployed backend.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence reports linking user features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pregenerated summaries of various frontend files and assets for reference or tooling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining steps and prerequisites for deploying the site as a permanent IC canister.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style layer defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with metadata, favicon links, and script loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering navigation, service sections, contact info, and share-link functionality with responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that handles loading errors with fallbacks or hidden rendering to prevent broken images.
frontend/src/config/shareLink.ts: Provides functions to build the public canister share URL and copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing auth state, login flow, identity persistence, and client configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Alternative global stylesheet defining warm industrial-design color tokens and dark mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that initializes query client, wraps the app in Internet Identity provider, and mounts the UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom theme extensions, animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s deployment state, including permanent ICP hosting goals, known issues with draft canisters, and active feature requests.
